step_feedback.feedback: Good start! Try to keep your shoulders a little closer to their ideal position.
Nicely done! Focus on bringing your shoulder blades together and down.
Great job completing the first rep! Keep the movement smooth and controlled.
Excellent! Your shoulders are moving well. Remember to engage your back muscles.
Very good! Continue to focus on the circular motion, squeezing your shoulder blades back and down.
Fantastic finish! You completed the exercise with good form and control.

exercise_summary: You did a great job with the shoulder rolls! Remember to gently squeeze your shoulder blades back and down in a circular motion. Try to inhale deeply when rolling back to maximize the benefit.
